name: Repair Rush
description:
Escape the terrorists and pick up tools for your handyman to repair your vehicle with while on the run! Are you up to the Challenge?!

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam in February 2020.

Credits

Design + Programming: Aaron Thearle, Robbie Wastell

Programming: Pol Porta Perera

Animations: Marty Rigz

Music: Thomas Pedersen

Models were all from some Synty asset pack.
